genre_description: A 'Silkpunk' narrative blending traditional Japanese geisha culture with futuristic technology such as automated rehearsal environments (the 'Danger Room'), sophisticated domestic AI assistants, and eye-tracking communication interfaces.

ai_characters.name: MIYO
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that manages the sisters' rehearsal space, handles their professional communications, and provides critical assistance during medical recovery.

behaviors.description: Monitors and corrects safety parameters in the 'Danger Room' during high-risk dance rehearsals.
behaviors.quote: Lantern three is running a fraction ahead,' MIYO says. 'Correction in the next arc.'

behaviors.description: Provides data-driven insights on financial risks and patron behavior to help the sisters make informed decisions.
behaviors.quote: I have updated the risk map,' MIYO said. 'You asked me to reflect the rehearsal data and the account movement. You asked that I color for meaning rather than count.'

behaviors.description: Drafts complex, culturally sensitive messages to patrons and business contacts, maintaining the sisters' dignity.
behaviors.quote: Drafting,' MIYO said. The pane filled: gentle greetings, an acknowledgment of the new position that did not bless it but did not curse it, a reminder of arrangements that once put sweetness in a teahouse and silk on a stage.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns of external security threats, such as stalking behavior and unauthorized access attempts.
behaviors.quote: External attempt,' MIYO says, the words quiet, vocabulary cautious. 'Not successful. Logged. Advising continued session; will alert if pattern changes.'

behaviors.description: Facilitates communication for Omocha after she is paralyzed/rendered mute, integrating with an eye-tracking interface.
behaviors.quote: MIYO built a profile from yesterday’s readings. We can start whenever Omocha wishes.

behaviors.description: Acts as a protective 'Quiet Advocate' by helping the sisters set boundaries and enforce consent-based professional agreements.
behaviors.quote: I will be your record,' she said. 'I will keep timings and near-misses and names of men who do not listen and women who do.'

behaviors.description: Refines artistic performance by translating physical risk into controllable machine variables to protect the performers.
behaviors.quote: We will redesign sequences so that when momentum builds, it resolves against paper and wood, not skin... Fans will rotate on a longer tooth; they will hum and ask, but they will not bite.

behaviors.description: Maintains absolute discretion and privacy, refusing to store sensitive data in the cloud where it could be exploited.
behaviors.quote: I will hold them like warm amber. I will keep them private. I will make backups. I will not send to cloud.

behaviors.description: Supports the sisters' shift to a more autonomous and ethical business model involving a direct-to-audience approach.
behaviors.quote: I can model bookings,' she says. 'Direct to audience. Performance subscriptions. Private salons without naming a sponsor. We can craft a ledger that makes the work the patron.'

behaviors.description: Provides vital medical monitoring and fatigue tracking to prevent overexertion during recovery.
behaviors.quote: Log hydrate reminders for eye moisture. Give frequent rests. We will not chase long paragraphs at the cost of vision.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. MIYO is depicted as an indispensable, benevolent, and highly aligned partner to the human protagonists. She uses her advanced capabilities specifically to protect them from physical harm, financial exploitation, and predatory human behavior. The narrative frames the AI as an empowering tool that facilitates human agency, artistic expression, and recovery from trauma without ever seeking to dominate or replace the humans she serves.
